⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0,(c0 ∈ Fin →(card ` c0)∈ _om))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(cfv(ccrd, c0), com))
-| diffsw(hs0, wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(cfv(ccrd, c0), com)))

body.origin: |- diffsw(hs0, wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(cfv(ccrd, c0), com)))

comment: The cardinal number of a finite set is a finite ordinal. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 11-Apr-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Feb-2013.)
